snippet.title: Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It's Dark Outside -All Parts - Full Gameplay/Walkthrough (Longplay)
snippet.description:
Full gameplay/walkthrough of Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It's Dark Outside - All Parts! Enjoy!

Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It's Dark Outside is a point & click adventure game in the Pajama Sam series developed by Humongous Entertainment for the Windows and Macintosh operating systems in 1996

 - Game information: 

Sam is an ordinary kid who, with the help of his red cape, turns into "superhero" Pajama Sam. In No Need to Hide When It’s Dark Outside, Pajama Sam journeys into the land of darkness (his closet) to face his fears. Help Pajama Sam figure out who or what is behind the darkness and realize that there is no need to hide when it’s dark outside!

------------------------

Watch more of this!

Part 1: https://youtu.be/g9u4de9uiOc
Part 2: https://youtu.be/OgSf8CMv0FE
Part 3: https://youtu.be/DP35kWVIWRU

Part 6: https://youtu.be/4OR0jXOM9NY
Part 7: https://youtu.be/j4nGdm_z6b0
Part 8: https://youtu.be/nKl8ZtGsLY8
Part 9: https://youtu.be/Bkvv4baNv2I
Part 10: https://youtu.be/LNFd3YhFPzc
